title: Implement deletion of tasks
description: Implement the ability to delete tasks upon pressing the 'd' key.

title: Cursor behaviour
description:
Implement all normal cursor behaviour:
 - Going back and forward through the command line.
 - Going up and down lines.
 - At end/beginning of lines, go to the end/beginning of line.

title: Implement closure of tasks
description: Upon pressing the 'c' key, the tasks marked as done shall disappear from the list.

title: Pop up for adding/editing a task
description: At the moment tasks are added by directly editing the description and title in the display box. However it would be better to introduce a pop up for editing and adding.

title: Settings page
description: A settings page with the ability to change the colour schemes, the layout between vertical and horizontal split. Remember to put an example at the bottom of it.

title: Coordinate style
description: Before the settings page, it would be good to get a consistent looking style for the whole application.

title: Saving of settings to json
description: The app should be able to save the settings to a json file.

title: Stats page
description: Let's note down here what stats might be useful and in which ways to present them.
